name: Fetch Quests Anonymous
description:
Fetch Quests Anonymous is a game made for Procjam 2018 - Explore a procgen world and talk to many interesting people, then deliver things for them.

Instructions:

Mouse Left Click - Interact with person
Mouse Middle Click - Zoom TOME
Mouse Right Click - Select / Accept menu input
Mouse Scroll - Scroll menu

Standard WASD controls apply.
